title: DOJ asks Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell 'about 100 different people,' lawyer says
summary: President Donald Trump is dealing with a weekslong backlash over the DOJ's decision not to release documents related to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: What Europe's response to a no-deal with Trump could look like
summary: Uncertainty remains about if and when a trade agreement between the EU and U.S. could be struck.

title: Inside the renovations of the Federal Reserve headquarters: Slideshow
summary: President Donald Trump has criticized Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell over the management of the renovation, which is over budget due to several factors.

title: Trump spars with Powell over renovation costs during Fed visit, but backs off firing threats
summary: Trump has previously signaled he was considering whether to fire Powell, though it is unclear if he has the legal authority to do so.

title: Trump Commerce Secretary Lutnick says U.S. auto CEOs are 'cool with' higher tariffs than Japan
summary: The head of the American Automotive Policy Council, which represents General Motors, Ford and Stellantis, raised concerns about Trump's Japan deal.

title: Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell will meet with DOJ official for second day
summary: The Trump administration has tried to quell pressure to release files about Jeffrey Epstein, the dead sex offender who once was a friend to the president.

title: Trump to visit Federal Reserve, escalating campaign against Chair Powell
summary: This is the first time in nearly two decades that an American president will be making an official trip to the central bank.

title: Republican senators join Dems on bill to exempt small businesses from Trump's Canada tariffs
summary: Trump recently said he will impose a 35% tariff on Canada, the latest salvo in his on-again, off-again trade war with the U.S. ally and top trade partner.

title: Watch: Trump delivers remarks on AI 'action plan' and signs executive orders
summary: The White House said Trump's AI action plan incudes requiring that developers' chatbots are "free of ideological bias" in order to be get federal contracts.

title: Trump was told his name was in Jeffrey Epstein files before DOJ withheld documents: WSJ
summary: President Donald Trump was friends with Jeffrey Epstein for years before the two men had a falling-out.

title: Trump administration ramps up its campaign against colleges
summary: The Trump administration launched multiple investigations into American universities on Wednesday, the latest moves in its campaign to reshape higher education.

title: Judge denies Trump admin bid to unseal Jeffrey Epstein grand jury transcripts in Florida
summary: President Donald Trump has faced criticism over the refusal of the Department of Justice to release evidence about the notorious sex offender Epstein.

title: Japan trade deal info on Trump's desk was altered by hand with a marker
summary: Details of the Japan deal seen in a photo posted by Dan Scavino, the White House deputy chief of staff, show discrepancies and last-minute edits.

title: Trump shifts gears to EU after striking Japan deal
summary: The U.S.-Japan trade deal sparked hopes that the European Union will also be able to strike an agreement.

title: White House releases U.S.-Indonesia trade deal framework, final talks underway
summary: The newly announced 19% tariff on Indonesian goods is lower than the 32% rate it had faced under President Donald Trump's previous "liberation day" plans.

title: Sen. Mike Lee posts, deletes fake Fed Chair Powell resignation letter: Reports
summary: The letter surfaced as President Donald Trump has bludgeoned the Federal Reserve chairman with criticism over his refusal to cut interest rates.

title: Trump says U.S. struck trade, military deal with the Philippines; Manila has not confirmed
summary: President Donald Trump said the U.S. has "concluded" a trade deal with the Philippines that includes a 19% tariff on goods from the Southeast Asian country.

title: House speaker starts August recess early to avoid Jeffrey Epstein votes
summary: The Trump administration has moved to release more information about notorious sex offenders Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

title: Trump China tariff deadline likely to be extended, Bessent says
summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he will meet next week with Chinese trade negotiators in Stockholm for discussions on avoiding steep tariffs.

title: DOJ official expects to meet with Jeffrey Epstein procurer Ghislaine Maxwell soon
summary: The Trump administration faces criticism for withholding investigative files about serial sexual abuser Jeffrey Epstein and his procurer Ghislaine Maxwell.

title: Judge in Trump Murdoch libel case handled lawsuit president dropped against Michael Cohen
summary: Proving that the Wall Street Journal's reporting is false would require Trump to answer questions under oath about Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Hunter Biden blames Ambien for President Biden's terrible Trump debate
summary: President Joe Biden's disastrous debate performance set events in motion that concluded with his dropping out of the 2024 presidential election.

title: Trump Media builds $2 billion bitcoin hoard, as cryptocurrency swells president's net worth
summary: Trump has embraced digital currency to such a degree that crypto now reportedly accounts for most of his net worth.

title: Aug. 1 is 'hard deadline' for Trump's tariffs, Commerce Secretary Lutnick says
summary: President Donald Trump's 'reciprocal" tariff deadline has shifted since April 2, but White House officials insist that Aug. 1 is a firm deadline.
